name: Pesto Quest
description:
Play as Pesto the cat and go on an adventure to find your lost brother Gnocchi.

Known issue: If you have level up points, hit ESC twice and the level up buttons will activate.

A winter storm knocked out my first day of jam time, so I wasn't able to finish entirely. I'm still really happy with the first two levels, and I'm still (at this time) planning to finish the final two levels.
